channel.title: Certificate on BTW IT Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Certificate on BTW IT Blog

item.title: AWS Certificate Management and WordPress
item.description: Create AWS Certificate Open AWS Console. Services > Security > Certificate Manager. Select Request Certificate Type domain name and click Review & Request Review the domain and Confirm and Request. An email will be sent to the webmaster/hostmaster/admin Once you have received to the email click on the link within the email to approve the request. Binding the Certificate to an EC2 Instance / Elastic Load Balancer (ELB)

item.title: SQL Reporting Services and Certificates
item.description: Error Message `Error Message ` Resolution Open Reporting Services Cofiguration Manager Remove certificate from the SQL Report Services open command prompt as an administrator and type the below command netsh http show sslcert This will show that there is a cert is still bound to port 443. Ran the below command and this will remove the binding netsh http delete sslcert ipport=1.1.1.1:443 After this you will be able bind the cert to the reporting services
